amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, prohibits air carriers from taking retaliatory action against a pilot for becoming a Federal flight deck officer and specifies that no air carrier shall prohibit a Federal flight deck officer from piloting an aircraft operated by the air carrier or terminate the employment of a Federal flight deck officer solely on the basis of his or her volunteering for or participating in the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to insert language providing that no air carrier shall prohibit or in any way refuse or discourage a pilot employed by the air carrier from becoming a Federal flight deck officer pursuant to the bill.

action.text: Hostettler amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent. Modification makes technical and conforming changes.
On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
